articles.title: Genetic tweaks to upgrade photosynthesis boost soy yield by a fifth
articles.description: Researchers have succeeded in making photosynthesis more efficient in soybean plants, in a major breakthrough that will mean less forest has to be cut down to make way for farms

articles.title: Google's quantum supremacy challenged by ordinary computers, for now
articles.description: In 2019, Google showed that its Sycamore quantum computer could solve a problem that no ordinary computer could handle - but now a new algorithm gives non-quantum devices the edge
articles.content:

articles.title: UK polecat numbers may be rising due to interbreeding with ferrets
articles.description: The population of polecats in Britain has recovered over the past century and it may be in part due to interbreeding with feral ferrets
articles.content:
By Jake Buehler
Polecats in England are hybrid ferrets
Jurgen Christine Sohns/Imagebroker/Shutterstock

articles.title: Mosquitoes have more ways to smell us than we thought
articles.description: Female mosquitoes that had their human-scent receptors blocked could still smell people. The finding suggests the insects have a more elaborate olfactory system than was previously known
articles.content:
By Corryn Wetzel
Mosquitoes rely on olfactory neurons located primarily on their antenna to sniff out human blood
Shutterstock/HelloRF Zcool

articles.title: Colombian dinosaur finally identified thanks to 2016 peace agreement
articles.description: A peace agreement in Colombia meant researchers could return to the site where a sauropod fossil was dug up in 1943 and name it as a new species, Perijasaurus lapaz

articles.title: Covid-19 linked to higher risk of brain conditions up to two years on
articles.description: The risk of being diagnosed with a neurological or psychiatric condition up to two years after catching covid-19 may be higher than with other respiratory infections, such as seasonal influenza
articles.content:

articles.title: More than one in eight Reddit users publish toxic posts
articles.description: An analysis of 1.2 million Reddit users found that around 16 per cent of people wrote toxic posts and 13 per cent wrote toxic comments, such as direct insults
articles.content:

Reddit posts have been analysed for toxic content

articles.title: Physicists surprised to discover the proton contains a charm quark
